display_long_description:
Revert is a VR horror movement game built around classic Gorilla Tag locomotion. You explore two connected facility-style maps filled with dark rooms, tight corridors, and eerie atmosphere. The goal is simple: move fast, stay alert, and avoid the dangers that roam the building.

Revert focuses on:
• Clean, familiar GTAG-style movement
• Two detailed facility maps with connected routes and hidden areas
• Dark, suspenseful environments that rely on tension rather than jumpscares
• Simple objectives while exploring each section
• Early-access development with improvements added often

This is an evolving project, and testers help shape new areas, mechanics, and features as the game grows.

If you enjoy facility-based VR horror with Gorilla Tag locomotion, Revert delivers a simple, atmospheric experience designed for exploration and tension.
